title: ‘Happy for Revenge’: Vingegaard, van Aert Strike Back at Volta ao Algarve in Crucial Early Season Test
content:
Vingegaard leapfrogs three UAE riders for GC victory, Van Aert hits form with second-place finish, Roglič leaves with questions after off-par start to the season,

Read the full article at ‘Happy for Revenge’: Vingegaard, van Aert Strike Back at Volta ao Algarve in Crucial Early Season Test on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
